top_stories.title: Agent Skills for Large Language Models: Architecture, Acquisition, Security, and the Path Forward
top_stories.summary: arXiv:2602.12430v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: The transition from monolithic language models to modular, skill-equipped agents marks a defining shift in how large language models (LLMs) are deployed in practice. Rather than encoding all procedural knowledge within model weights, agent skills -- composable packages of instructions, code,
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Agent orchestration is emerging as a new software abstraction layer.
top_stories.primary_risk: Debugging complexity and cascading failures in agentic systems.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: End-to-end automation of complex cognitive workflows.

top_stories.title: AI Digital Twins Are Helping People Manage Diabetes and Obesity
top_stories.summary: As patients and employers look for alternatives to pricey GLP-1 drugs, Silicon Valley startup Twin Health is using AI and wearable sensors to help people make healthier choices.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Adds empirical validation to approaches already used in production AI stacks.
top_stories.primary_risk: Marginal performance gains may not justify integration effort.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Foundation for future optimization rather than immediate disruption.

top_stories.title: The Small English Town Swept Up in the Global AI Arms Race
top_stories.summary: The residents of Potters Bar are working to protect the “green belt” of farms, forests, and meadows that surround London from the endless demand for AI infrastructure.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Reinforces known techniques with modest refinements to existing methods.
top_stories.primary_risk: Risk of overfitting conclusions to narrow benchmarks.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Practical improvements when layered onto existing AI workflows.

top_stories.title: Variation is the Key: A Variation-Based Framework for LLM-Generated Text Detection
top_stories.summary: arXiv:2602.13226v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Detecting text generated by large language models (LLMs) is crucial but challenging. Existing detectors depend on impractical assumptions, such as white-box settings, or solely rely on text-level features, leading to imprecise detection ability. top_stories.technical_takeaway: Reinforces known techniques with modest refinements to existing methods.
top_stories.primary_risk: Unclear production readiness despite promising early results.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Foundation for future optimization rather than immediate disruption.

top_stories.title: PlotChain: Deterministic Checkpointed Evaluation of Multimodal LLMs on Engineering Plot Reading

top_stories.technical_takeaway: Adds empirical validation to approaches already used in production AI stacks.
top_stories.primary_risk: Unclear production readiness despite promising early results.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Practical improvements when layered onto existing AI workflows.
